Text: EnronOnline Internal Guest ID and PasswordYour EnronOnline user ID and password is as follows User ID EOL Password WELCOME Please note that the User ID and password will need to be in all upper case Just a reminder in order to access EnronOnline shockwave needs to be installed The shockwave installer can be found within About EnronOnline on the home page After opening About EnronOnline using right scroll bar go to the bottom Click on download shockwave and follow the directions After loading shockwave shut down and reopen browser ie Microsoft Internet Explorer Netscape Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or problems getting into the system Thanks Griff Gray x

EnronOnline Internal Guest ID and PasswordYour EnronOnline user ID and password is as follows User ID EOL Password WELCOME Please note that the User ID and password will need to be in all upper case Just a reminder in order to access EnronOnline shockwave needs to be installed The shockwave installer can be found within About EnronOnline on the home page After opening About EnronOnline using right scroll bar go to the bottom Click on download shockwave and follow the directions After loading shockwave shut down and reopen browser ie Microsoft Internet Explorer Netscape Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or problems getting into the system Thanks Griff Gray x

EnronOnline Internal Guest ID and PasswordYour EnronOnline user ID and password is as follows User ID EOL Password WELCOME Please note that the User ID and password will need to be in all upper case Just a reminder in order to access EnronOnline shockwave needs to be installed The shockwave installer can be found within About EnronOnline on the home page After opening About EnronOnline using right scroll bar go to the bottom Click on download shockwave and follow the directions After loading shockwave shut down and reopen browser ie Microsoft Internet Explorer Netscape Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or problems getting into the system Thanks Griff Gray x

The New Power Company adm ability to transactI am again The products that the customer desires is all types financialphysical for gas and power What do you think Thanks Griff Forwarded by Mary Griff GrayHOUECT on PM From Mary Griff Gray PM To Walter GuidrozNAEnron Tom MoranHOUECT cc Tana CT William S BradfordHOUECT Subject The New Power Company adm ability to transact Guys I received a call from Mike Garred admin for The New Power Company wanting to confirm that his company is properly set up in EOL everything is fine from our end What does this customer need to do to get credit Thanks Griff

Re The New Power Company adm ability to transactfor the info From Tana Jones on PM To Mary Griff CT cc Tom nronXGate Walter nronXGate Stephanie CT Subject Re The New Power Company adm ability to transact I just spoke to Mike Garred and John Raineri wThe New Power Company Per this conv it appears that ENA has master agreements in place to trade financial and physical gas I directed him to Shari Stack a lawyer in the power group to discuss getting a master agreement in place with EPMI to trade physical power They are aware that Credit is working on getting them some headroom and as soon as they counterparty comes out of Credit well get them approved to trade pending resolution of physical power approval from Shari If Credit could verbally let me know when they are approved Id appreciate it so Ill know to look for them I will be traveling to Calgary Tuesday so I may be incommunicado while the planes in flight so that could possibly hold things up Mary Griff Gray PM To Walter GuidrozNAEnron Tom MoranHOUECT Tana CT cc Subject The New Power Company adm ability to transact Here I am again The products that the customer desires is all types financialphysical for gas and power What do you think Thanks Griff Forwarded by Mary Griff GrayHOUECT on PM From Mary Griff Gray PM To Walter GuidrozNAEnron Tom MoranHOUECT cc Tana CT William S BradfordHOUECT Subject The New Power Company adm ability to transact Guys I received a call from Mike Garred admin for The New Power Company wanting to confirm that his company is properly set up in EOL everything is fine from our end What does this customer need to do to get credit Thanks Griff
bp Oil Supply registration status Just checking the status of this companys application for EOL Thanks Griff

Re bp Oil Supply registration status youre too good From Tana Jones on AM To Karen O NRON cc Mary Griff CT Subject Re bp Oil Supply registration status That signed ETA Amendment came in about a week ago and the copy has already been sent to Lisa Lees and the file is closed as far as Im concerned Karen O NRON AM To Mary Griff CT cc Tana CT Subject Re bp Oil Supply registration status Company has turned in an amendment for the ETA Electronic Trading Agreement Legal is reviewing it at this point Karen ODay From Mary Griff Gray ECT AM To Tana CT Karen O nron cc Subject bp Oil Supply registration status Ladies Just checking the status of this companys application for EOL Thanks Griff

FW Sierra Pacific Power Company adm wanting tenure of monthsTana Would you give me a heads up when this customers profile has been changed Thanks Griff x Original Message From Guidroz Walter Sent Thursday May AM To Gray Mary Griff Cc Moore Kathy M Moran Tom Subject RE Sierra Pacific Power Company adm wanting tenure of months Griff Ive updated the profile for both Sierra Pacific and Nevada Power to reflect a month tenor Tana is out so Im not sure exactly when this will go through Thanks for your note Ive enjoyed working with you too Yes Ill be working as a geologist but also with an element of project management over two large offshore field complexes as well as a pseudoteam leader over some lesser experienced geologists and geophysicists It should be interesting Take care Walter Original Message From Gray Mary Griff Sent Thursday May AM To Guidroz Walter Moran Tom Subject FW Sierra Pacific Power Company adm wanting tenure of months I talked to Stephanie Sever yesterday and she said that this was back in your court When will the US gas and power products get revised from one month to Ill be out of the office tomorrow Friday the th so let Kathy Moore know the status and shell update the ticket on this customer Walter good luck to you Are you going back to the geology area Thanks for being such a great person to work with Walter Griff Original Message From Guidroz Walter Sent Monday April PM To Gray Mary Griff Cc Moran Tom Subject RE Sierra Pacific Power Company adm wanting tenure of months Griff well go months on both this counterparty as well as on Nevada Power Ill include this in todays approval spreadsheet Thanks Walter Original Message From Gray Mary Griff Sent Friday April AM To Guidroz Walter Cc Moran Tom Subject Sierra Pacific Power Company adm wanting tenure of months Hey guys Want do you know about this request Thanks Griff
Sunoco RMJust checking to see when this customer will get their transaction ID Thanks Griff
Nobel Americas ability to transact MTBE How soon will this customer be able to transact MTBE Tom Moran in credit has already blessed this product Thanks Griff x

RE Nobel Americas ability to transact MTBEGreat Ill be on the look out tomorow am so I can call the customer and let em know they can rock n roll on MTBE Griff Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Thursday May AM To Gray Mary Griff Subject Re Nobel Americas ability to transact MTBE They should be approved today They were on last nights list Mary Griff nronXgate AM To Tana CT cc Subject Nobel Americas ability to transact MTBE Tana How soon will this customer be able to transact MTBE Tom Moran in credit has already blessed this product Thanks Griff x

two customers with requests AES Eastern Energy and Noble Americasthe latest scoop on these requests AES Eastern Energy registration process when will ID be issued Noble Americas request for ability to transact multiple products beside MTBE Thanks abunch Griff
AES Eastern EnergyWhats the status on this registration The customer is eager to receive transaction status calls fairly often so I would call that eager Thanks Griff

AES Eastern EnergyTana Is this app almost through Legal The customer is anxious to get on board this has been an extremely difficult process so far Thanks Tana and have a wonderful holiday weekend Griff Original Message From Gray Mary Griff Sent Wednesday May AM To Sever Stephanie Jones Tana Subject AES Eastern Energy Ladies Whats the status on this registration The customer is eager to receive transaction status calls fairly often so I would call that eager Thanks Griff

RE AES Eastern Energy thanks Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Friday May AM To Gray Mary Griff Subject Re AES Eastern Energy I need to approve Ill approve today Mary Griff nronXgate AM To Tana CT cc Subject AES Eastern Energy Miss Tana Is this app almost through Legal The customer is anxious to get on board this has been an extremely difficult process so far Thanks Tana and have a wonderful holiday weekend Griff Original Message From Gray Mary Griff Sent Wednesday May AM To Sever Stephanie Jones Tana Subject AES Eastern Energy Ladies Whats the status on this registration The customer is eager to receive transaction status calls fairly often so I would call that eager Thanks Griff
Tom Brown Resources LTD application status Cc According to Access this customers app cleared Credit on May th Could you give me an ETA on when Legal will bless this application Thanks abunch Griff x

RE Tom Brown Resources LTD application status Cc Tana for letting me know Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Thursday June AM To Gray Mary Griff Subject Re Tom Brown Resources LTD application status I have a call into the EOL team about this one Ive tried to approve but no products will come into the queue Mary Griff nronXgate AM To Tana CT cc Cyntia nronXgate Subject Tom Brown Resources LTD application status Tana According to Access this customers app cleared Credit on May th Could you give me an ETA on when Legal will bless this application Thanks abunch Griff x

EnronOnline Cc Steven Borgman Vinson Elkins Thank you for your interest in EnronOnline As you requested the following is a guest password that will allow you temporary view only access to EnronOnline Please note the user ID and password are CASE SENSITIVE Guest User ID ENA Guest Password QUVN In order to apply for transaction status with EnronOnline your company nee ds to complete a Password Application and Registration Form for a Master User account Each Master User will then be able to grant various levels of access for additional users To obtain a Password Application and Registration Form you can visit our website at wwwenrononlinecom and select the How to Register link or call our HelpDesk at HELP Alternatively you may click on the attached documents complete the forms and fax to We hope you will find that EnronOnline provides an easy and more efficient way to do business with Enron We look forward to transacting with you onli ne Sincerely Mary Griff Gray EnronOnline HelpDesk HELP

Re Western Area Power Admin Upper Great Plainsfor the info now Im going to start praying that they dont request financial ability From Tana Jones on AM To Mary Griff CT cc Subject Re Western Area Power Admin Upper Great Plains Because they are a governmental entity in order to do financial our lawyers would need to talk to them about their authorizing statutes legislative authority and possible legal opinions before they can trade financial So if they want to trade financial get me a name and phone number probably of one of their lawyers and well have to talk to them Mary Griff Gray AM To Tana CT cc Subject Re Western Area Power Admin Upper Great Plains Great thanks If they want to do financial would that be possible From Tana Jones on AM To Mary Griff CT cc Subject Re Western Area Power Admin Upper Great Plains Just an heads up they are open to trade physical power which I expect is what they want to trade but not financial Mary Griff Gray AM To Tana CT cc Claudia CT Subject Re Western Area Power Admin Upper Great Plains Tana Thanks for the info the customer will be excited to have permanent access Griff From Tana Jones on AM To Mary Griff CT cc Claudia CT Subject Re Western Area Power Admin Upper Great Plains Legal has signed off on the counterparty so I expect it is being held up with the online team for some reason Mary Griff Gray AM To Tana CT Claudia CT cc Subject Western Area Power Admin Upper Great Plains TanaClaudia Could you bring me uptodate on the progress of this app Thanks Griff x From Mary Griff Gray AM To Claudia CT cc Tana CT Subject Western Area Power Admin Upper Great Plains Claudia I see that this app is still in Legal since Could you give me an ETA on it Thanks Griff

Re ANP Marketing Cc I talked to Jeff Mansfield this am and he implied that they should be receiving a blessing for transacting power Im not sure where he got that info but it must not be true huh Thanks Griff Forwarded by Mary Griff GrayHOUECT on AM Bradley Diebner AM To Mary Griff CT cc Stephanie CT Tom CT Subject Re ANP Marketing We approved these guys yesterday for gas Our power team is looking at them for power but a message came down from legal that they will probably be shut down for power They are open for gas From Mary Griff Gray AM To Bradley CT Stephanie CT cc Tom CT Subject ANP Marketing Hey guys This company wants to be approved for both gas and power transactions Thanks Griff Forwarded by Mary Griff GrayHOUECT on AM From Mary Griff Gray AM To Bradley CT cc Subject ANP Marketing Brad Heres another one They come in groups you know Hopefully this will be the last credit question for a bit How is the credit part coming on this companys app The latest Access data base entry appears to be October rd Thanks Griff

MidAmerica Energy Company wants to transact power financial products Just wondering how Legal is looking for this customer Thanks Griff Forwarded by Mary Griff GrayHOUECT on PM From Walter nronXgate on PM To Mary Griff CT cc Subject FW FW MidAmerica Energy Company wants to transact power financial products Griff well open up this CP for financial power products as indicated below Tenor will be months Ill include it on my approval spreadsheet for today thanks WG Original Message From Conwell Wendy Sent Wednesday February PM To Guidroz Walter Cc Sacks Edward Ngo Tracy Radous Paul Moran Tom Subject Re FW MidAmerica Energy Company wants to transact power financial products Yes That is fine Do we need to allocate a certain amount of our EOL line to financial products From Walter nronXgate on PM To Edward nronXgate Wendy nron Tracy CT Paul nronXgate cc Tom nronXgate Subject FW MidAmerica Energy Company wants to transact power financial products I see we have a master with this counterparty that covers all products Is there any problem in opening this counterparty up for financial power products on EOL They are currently open for US East and West Power physical only Please advise as appropriate thanks WG Original Message From Gray Mary Griff Sent Wednesday February PM To Guidroz Walter Tom NRON Subject MidAmerica Energy Company wants to transact power financial products Just checkin to see if any decision has been made Forwarded by Mary Griff GrayHOUECT on PM From Mary Griff Gray PM To Walter nron Tom CT cc Subject MidAmerica Energy Company wants to transact power financial products Whats your opinion guys Thanks Griff
